attributes.action: Making illegal for schools to make rules conflicting non-european hair types.
attributes.background:
I'm hearing stories on children getting sent home, (mainly - & sadly Afro-caribbean - not excluding African heritage.) 

All because their hair is either too long, too short or of a different hairstyle that is practical like braids or religious dreads locks. I feel this needs to STOP today.

rejection.details: Under the Equality Act, it is already illegal for schools to discriminate against anyone because of their protected characteristics, including race or ethnicity.
